answers.answer: Bump

My uncle's wife delivered her twins a week ago at 35weeks+6! They came as healthy as can be with a loud cry for both baby c: don't worry so much, stress is no good! Good luck with your twin pregnancy!

I was so afraid of having my twins early because my mom had me and my twin sister at 32 weeks. My aunt had her twins at 28 weeks. And anyone else i knew had theres early. But im currently 36weeks and 2days with twins (: and have a scheduled c-section for September 30th. Ill be 37 weeks (:

The main reason I'm concerned because the girl I referred to I told her the pain I was having and she said she had the same exact thing and end up being admitted to the hospital and had her babies today cause like I told her even tho it's different cause its two I didn't get this pain till late pregnancy close to labor with my daughter

Ive been having contractions and pressure since 28 weeks. I also have a long list of reasons im high risk. All of my doctors thought i would go hy 35 weeks. Just stay positive and talk to your doctor about all the pains and worrys.
They always say something normal they did that with my first and the whole time my cervix was thinning like they don't find out wats wrong they just say oh it normal take tylenol

@Kenny1995 hi and congratulations on the twins dint stress your self can I ask you when you first took a pregnancy test did it come back positive real early I'm just curious I wish I was having twins but I not for sure yet but at 3 weeks pregnant I took 3 home pregnancy test which came back positive immediately is it possible (: I am I know I still have to get an ultrasound to confirm it good luck on your babies (:
Wow twins do you know what your having (:
Wow twins do you know what your having (:
Ugh I knew way before but the test dunt show positive till later
And not yet
It's very seldom to get a false positive so I think so

Try not to stress about it, it's not good for you or the babies.. Every pregnancy is different. What kind of twins.. Identical, fraternal, MonoDi, or monomono? That also will play a part in preterm labor. I'm 35 weeks pregnant with MonoDi indentical twin girls and have a scheduled c section in a week and half, I'll be 36 weeks 4 days when I have them... I didn't even think I would make it this long, try to stay positive! I know it's a scary thing.
Didi  and it don't make it no better that I had a dream of early labor and triplets

You should be able to make it to at least 37 weeks, since they both have their own sac and own placenta.. Much better chance of making it longer than with one placenta two sacs or one placenta one sac. How far along are you now? Yeah, I get it.. It's all in your mind though.. Early pregnancy I kept having dreams my girls were born super super early and freaking out, crying and saying it was too early. Just try to relax mama and not stress so much about it.
16 almost 17 and I try to avoid stress but my environment makes me stress my blood pressure was high not ro long ago

Yup, totally understand a stressful environment, try to not let it get to you. You need to focus on keeping you and those babies healthy. That's all that matters right now. I would talk to your doc about the high blood pressure.. Especially if you start having excessive swelling in you feet and ankles.. Especially if one side is considerably worse than the other.. And your face, around your eyes start swelling too.. That's a sign of preeclampsia. Drink lots of fluids and take lots of rest breaks. Good luck mama, everything will be fine!
Thank u and I did I wasn't high after that and I've been doing better with it
37 weeks is normal for twins. My aunts twin is having triplets so I've been reading about this stuff.
Ok

question: I'm so afraid that I will have them very early I just don't know everytime I see someone have twins and find out they had them very early it scares me a girl today had to get a emergency c section after they stopped the contractions and hers came at 27 weeks any ladies with experience  or advice
title: Twin Pregnancy
